short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add additional data next to Twitter usernames

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bond Extension
Discover a deeper layer of Twitter with the Bond Extension. Enhance your Twitter browsing experience by easily accessing additional user data directly on Twitter profiles.

Features:
User Data Display: The extension automatically fetches and displays pertinent user data from the FriendTech next to User's tweets on your feed and and giving you an insightful glimpse into the user profile you are visiting.

Many more features coming soon!
